Dozens of ember constructs activate simultaneously.
ELITE_PACK: Veteran wardens step forward with measured, lethal intent.
Cinder-forged elites surround your group with practiced precision.
A hardened vanguard of the Ashen Order blocks the path ahead.
MINI_BOSS: The ancient guardian rises from its dormant throne.
An immense construct of void-touched iron awakens before you.
The Vault Warden's chains rattle as it turns to face intruders.

Embers drift past as you press deeper into the Crypt.

victory_lines: The last enemy falls. Well fought.
Clear! The path ahead is yours.
wipe_lines: The party has been defeated. The Crypt claims more victims.
Darkness takes the group. Try again with better preparation.
Your party has fallen. The Ashen Sovereign endures.
